content:
Whoops my bad on the hackmd params.  FYI leaving off `--miner-enabled` and `--miner-coinbase` will keep besu from proposing blocks prior to the PoS transition, but otherwise will propose blocks post-PoS as long as the consensus client is passing a suggestedCoinbase.  

I'll file an issue with besu to clarify coinbase config behavior.  ğŸ™

author: metanull
content: I have taken the official kintsugi testnet instructions for Prysm/geth and filled in some details necessary when starting from a base Ubuntu installation. There are some other good options for getting up and running on kintsugi, but as I have been doing since 2019, I have documented my process for my own purposes and hope others can benefit. https://github.com/metanull-operator/eth2-ubuntu/blob/master/kintsugi.md
